A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi takes so many risks and is drastically different than anything else we’ve seen before. It swings big and hits in almost every aspect. Finn’s arc is undoubtedly the weakest part\, but there’s so much else the movie does right\, it’s difficult for this one part to knock the entire product that much. Performances are solid across the board. Action is great and grand.
